articles.content: In 151 years of this historic fixture, it has generally been dominated by England. Following 139 matches Scotland have only won 44 times, but the tide has turned and their fans are very much looking … [+10649 chars]

articles.title: Tom Brady posts greatest hits farewell video - and this time he DOES include the Patriots - Daily Mail
articles.description: Tom Brady posted a farewell video featuring his career highlights, this time including his time with the New England Patriots after fans criticized his failure to include the team in his retirement statement.
